products.name: ZOMA BAFIX FOAM
products.purpose: cleaning agent designet to remove scale from bathroom surfaces
products.description: Zoma Bafix Foam is a ready-to-use, foaming cleaning agent designed to remove scale from bathroom surfaces. It effectively eliminates limescale and other types of dirt. Suitable for use on undamaged porcelain, ceramic, and enamel sanitary surfaces.
doNotUse: Do not mix Zoma Bafix Foam with chlorine-containing products.
Do not use on acid-sensitive surfaces such as marble and others.
